findings.details: CI workflow has 4 distinct jobs (lint, typecheck, test, build) with clear responsibilities. PR workflow has 4 jobs (pr-validation, code-quality, test-coverage, security-scan).
Build job depends on [lint, typecheck, test] - clear linear dependency. No circular dependencies.
Jobs run in parallel (lint, typecheck, test run concurrently). Can add matrix builds for multiple Python versions if needed.
All jobs fail on error by default. Coverage threshold (70%) enforced. continue-on-error used appropriately for non-blocking checks.
Python version in env variable. Secrets (CODECOV_TOKEN) from GitHub secrets. No hardcoded values.
Coverage reports uploaded to Codecov. Build artifacts uploaded. Ruff output in GitHub format for annotations.

recommendation: APPROVED - No blocking issues found. Architecture follows CI/CD best practices.
